tr.td: (StrOpt) The base mac address used for unique DVR instances by Neutron. The first 3 octets will remain unchanged. If the 4th octet is not 00, it will also be used. The others will be randomly generated. The 'dvr_base_mac' *must* be different from 'base_mac' to avoid mixing them up with MAC's allocated for tenant ports. A 4 octet example would be dvr_base_mac = fa:16:3f:4f:00:00. The default is 3 octet
(BoolOpt) System-wide flag to determine the type of router that tenants can create. Only admin can override.
